name: Fly Bird Fly!
description:
Tap to Control The Bird. Avoid hitting the pipes!

Collect the coins. But don’t you forget to look out for enemies and obstacles!

Fly Bird Fly is great for every age. Young and old can compete against each other. Families can enjoy lots of fun with this game. Just enjoy the flight around the city and collect all the coins. 5 Coins = 1 Point

√ Beautiful design
√ Challenging achievements
√ Fun to play for everyone
√ Leaderboards
√ Great music

This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.

Important Message for Parents

This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.

Download Fly Bird Fly Game Now and have fun!
